roleset.name: characterized by friendship

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: hmmmm - I could understand it if the break up had been amicable and they remained good friends...

example.name: All args
example.text: We settled on a 50% exchange rate which was amicable to me.

roleset.note: AMICABLE-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. (from amicable.01-j)
